0.text: Innate: Each of Syndra's abilities gain an additional effect at maximum rank.
Active: Syndra conjures a Dark Sphere at the target location that appears after a 0.6-second delay, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies. The Dark Sphere then remains on the ground for 6 seconds.

1.text: Transcendent Bonus: Dark Sphere deals 25% bonus damage against  champions.

2.text: Dark Sphere will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Syndra grabs the nearest  Dark Sphere, enemy  minion or non-epic  monster within 400 range from the target location, and holds it for 5 seconds. If a Dark Sphere is grabbed, its duration is refreshed; if a minion or monster is grabbed, it is put in  stasis. If no valid target can be found at the target location, Syndra will grab the nearest  Dark Sphere.

1.text: Force of Will can be recast while the target is being held.

2.text: Recast: Syndra throws the grabbed target towards the target location, granting  sight of their surroundings as they fall and dealing magic damage to them and nearby enemies,  slowing all of them for 1.5 seconds.

3.text: Transcendent Bonus: Force of Will deals「  20% bonus true damage. 」「 46 (+ 14% AP) bonus true damage. 」

0.text: Active: Syndra propels a wave of force in a cone in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and  knocks them back for 400 units and up to 800 units away from Syndra based on proximity, though not through terrain.

1.text: Dark Spheres can be knocked back for 1000 units and up to 1300 units away from Syndra based on proximity,  knocking back enemies they hit over 100 units, though not through terrain. This also  stuns and  reveals them for 1.5 seconds, and deals Scatter the Weak's damage if they were not damaged by the initial cast.

2.text: Transcendent Bonus: Scatter the Weak's area of effect is 50% wider.

0.text: Active: Syndra enters a 0.264 seconds cast time, creating  3 Dark Spheres and grabbing up to 4 nearby Dark Spheres that were last spawned. Afterwards, the collected Dark Spheres are hurled in a volley at the target enemy champion, each dealing magic damage upon hit.

1.text: The  Dark Spheres will then remain on the ground for 6 seconds.

2.text: Transcendent Bonus: Unleashed Power's cast range is increased.
